rules_text: Whenever a nonland anomaly you control leaves the battlefield during your turn, you may cast a copy of it without paying its mana cost, except that spell isn’t a creature spell if the anomaly was a creature. [i](A card with multiple card types is an anomaly)[/i]
notes:

OG_1:
Whenever a nonland anomaly you control leaves the battlefield, you may cast a copy of it without paying its mana cost, except that spell isn’t a creature spell if the anomaly was a creature.
